mapper.select: SELECT level as LVL, review_num, review_title, review_con, review_star, review_date, review_image, review_rec from tb_review START WITH review_parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR review_num=review_parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY review_num DESC
mapper.delete: delete from tb_review where review_num in ( SELECT review_num FROM tb_review START WITH review_num = #{review_num} CONNECT BY PRIOR review_num = review_parentNO)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( select ROWNUM as recNum,LVL, review_num, parentNO, review_title, user_id, review_Date from (select LEVEL as LVL, review_num, parentNO, review_title, user_id, review_Date from tb_review START WITH review_parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR review_num = review_parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY review_num DESC) ) where recNum between(#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10
